Name: Vicore Industries
Details: Vicore Industries is a design-focused firm known for creating "Project Phoenix" BattleMech upgrades producible by existing manufacturers. Rather than mass-producing 'Mechs, Vicore acts as a third-party design house, with one division being Striker Arms Corporation. Vicore Industries claims official neutrality, but persistent rumors suggest undisclosed alliances and hidden agendas behind their widespread influence.
